node.title: If you think this is rats jumping off a sinking political ship, think again
node.alt: Morrison in focus looking across to Hunt (out of focus in foreground).
node.description: The departure of some of the nation's most high-profile Liberal politicians on the eve on an election easily lends itself to the suggestion of rats fleeing a sinking ship. But as the last poll showed, it's not over until the votes are cast, writes political correspondent Brett Worthington.
node.content:
["The departure of some of the nation's most high-profile Liberal\u00a0politicians on the eve on an election easily lends itself to the suggestion of rats fleeing a sinking ship.\u00a0", "But anyone who thinks the outcome of the next federal election has already been decided need only flash back to 2019, when polls and perception suggested Labor's Bill Shorten had been all but sworn in as prime minister.", "Elections, as Scott Morrison proved two years ago, aren't over until the votes are counted.", "There are few surprises in the retirements of Health Minister Greg Hunt and former attorney-general Christian Porter.\u00a0", "Speculation had\u00a0been mounting all year that both would depart the federal political arena at the next election.", "In the case of Hunt, it comes after a 20-year career in federal politics.", "For Porter it's more complicated. Once touted as a future prime minister, his move to the backbench earlier this year all but ended his political ambitions.", "But the departures of high-profile\u00a0senior politicians\u00a0who have reached the peak of their political careers\u00a0on the eve on an election are\u00a0far from new.", "", "
Scott Morrison promoted women to his cabinet after his unexpected 2019 election victory.(ABC News: Andrew Kennedy)
", "
Regenerating while winning an unwinnable election
", "After Scott Morrison replaced Malcolm Turnbull as Prime Minister, six cabinet ministers announced their retirements ahead of the 2019 election.", "In winning an election few tipped he could, Morrison inadvertently benefited from a regeneration of his political ranks.", "With Hunt gone, his cabinet only includes four ministers who were there when a Tony Abbott-led Coalition rose to power in 2013.", "Anthony Albanese's shadow cabinet, in contrast, still has 12 of the 20 ministers present in the final Kevin Rudd cabinet in 2013.", "It's a point not lost within the ranks of Labor's backbench, where there's frustration at the lack of frontbench renewal during its opposition years.", "", "
Christian Porter has announced he's quitting federal politics
", "
PM contends with election conundrum\u00a0
", "Scott Morrison must have a federal election before June next year.", "Ahead of the final sitting fortnight, the conventional thinking was he would have an early budget in March ahead of an election in May \u2014\u00a0a repeat of his successful 2019 formula.", "That timing would allow the Prime Minister to use the limited parliamentary sittings to turn the election into a battle over which side of politics will\u00a0better handle an economy recovering from a COVID-19-induced recession.", "But the messiness of the final sitting fortnight \u2014\u00a0with Coalition politicians crossing the floor and others refusing to back government legislation \u2014\u00a0has raised doubt within the government that Morrison will want to endure another sitting period.\u00a0", "They figure his time is better spent campaigning in the community, rather than having to wrangle freelancing backbenchers in the parliament.", "Morrison heads into a two-month parliamentary break with the political year ending where it started \u2014\u00a0with a spotlight on the treatment of women at Parliament House.", "Former Liberal staffer Brittany Higgins's allegation\u00a0that she was raped in a ministerial office back in 2019 shook the foundations of Parliament House when it emerged.", "This week saw the release of a landmark report,\u00a0which was initiated following Higgins's allegations, and in doing so brought that incident back into the national focus.", "It was made worse for Morrison when he had to announce cabinet minister Alan Tudge would be standing aside pending an investigation into fresh allegations of an emotional, and on one occasion, physically abusive\u00a0relationship with a staffer \u2014\u00a0allegations he denies.", "Every day he has to speak about the Liberal Party's so-called \"women\u00a0problem\", which is more accurately framed as a \"men\u00a0problem\" given it's about how men poorly treat women, is another day Morrison doesn't get\u00a0to frame the election on his terms.", "", "
'It's time to come home': Greg Hunt confirms he will retire at the next election
", "
Pressure to pre-select women
", "Both Hunt and Porter have given the party time to find candidates to replace them.", "The Liberals were already facing pressure to pre-select women as their replacements and those calls have only become louder following the Sex Discrimination Commissioner's findings this week.", "In announcing his retirement, Hunt said he wanted a woman to replace him as the Liberal candidate in his seat.", "Treasurer Josh Frydenberg, who beat his\u00a0close friend Hunt in a ballot for deputy leader of the Liberals in 2018, earlier on Thursday said he wanted female candidates to contest both seats.", "For Scott Morrison to remain Prime Minister he'll need those women to win the seats in question.\u00a0", "Their success would go some way\u00a0towards adding more women to the Liberal ranks.", "And while that would be a welcome further step towards addressing the issues outlined in Kate Jenkins's report, reaching gender parity is still miles away."]
